sentence.Network_en: Every country in the region was a military dictatorship.
sentence.Network_cn: 该地区的所有国家都是军事独裁国家。

sentence.Network_en: There is no short cut from dictatorship to democracy.
sentence.Network_cn: 从独裁到民主没有捷径可走。

sentence.Network_en: That country is now living under a military dictatorship.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个国家现在正处于军事独裁统治之下.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 所谓专政（dictatorship）是指一定阶级的政治统治，说明白一点，就是在政治上、经济上占统治地位的阶级，运用其掌握的国家权力…
独字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 独步〖 havenorival;prominent〗 独裁〖 dictatorship〗 独裁者〖 dictator〗.
...独裁政体（dictatorship）又称独裁体制，是一个描述政权的政治学概念，由一个人，或少数人组成的党派集团，不受宪政与法律的限制，控制绝对政治权力的政治形式或政治系统。它通常会对人民生活及行动进行广泛且极端控制R|大英百科全书，是和民主相对立的概念
英语常用的词根词缀_百度知道 ... leadership（ 领导权）, dictatorship（ 专制） sanity（ 神智健全）.

list.abs: 转&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;历史双语词汇表... ... 詹姆士二世 James II 军事独裁 military dictatorship 爱尔兰 Ireland.
...世袭专政（hereditary dictatorship），又称家族独裁（Family dictatorship），一种独裁政体的形式，名义上采取共和制，但是它的运作方式类似于君主制与独裁政体，国家独裁者的位置以血缘世袭方式掌握国家权力，传承国家元首.
马克思本人甚少使用“无产阶级专政”（proletarian dictatorship）一词，当他使用这个词的时候，他实际上指的是无产阶级在政治上的统治地位，“无产阶级专政”是一个非常短暂.
democratic dictatorship of the workers and peasants ., 工农民主专政.

entry.tran: 独裁政府;独裁统治;专政
entry.def: Dictatorship is government by a dictator.

example.ex: ...a new era of democracy after a long period of military dictatorship in the country.
example.tran: 该国长期军事独裁后迎来的一个新的民主时代
由独裁政府统治的国家

entry.def: A dictatorship is a country which is ruled by a dictator or by a very strict and harsh government.

example.ex: Every country in the region was a military dictatorship.
example.tran: 该地区的所有国家都是军事独裁国家。

means.word_mean: 1. a form of government in which the ruler is an absolute dictator (not restricted by a constitution or laws or opposition etc.)

auth_sentence.content: For them, Egypt has chosen democracy over dictatorship.
auth_sentence.res_content: For them, Egypt has chosen democracy over dictatorship.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For them, Egypt has chosen democracy over dictatorship.

auth_sentence.content: Only in a dictatorship would you consider stopping him.
auth_sentence.res_content: Only in a dictatorship would you consider stopping him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Only in a dictatorship would you consider stopping him.

auth_sentence.content: But he despised the advocates of a dictatorship of virtue.
auth_sentence.res_content: But he despised the advocates of a dictatorship of virtue.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But he despised the advocates of a dictatorship of virtue.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 名词,表示"某种技能"; 2. 表名词,表示"某种关系,状态"

stems_affixes.word_buile: airman飞行员,空军+ship某种技能→n.飞行术,导航技术
horseman养马的人,骑师,马兵+ship某种技能→n.马术

stems_affixes.value_cn: 推销术,说服力,销售,推销
stems_affixes.word_buile: salsman推销员+ship某种技能→n.推销术,说服力,销售,推销
champion冠军+ship某种关系,状态→n.锦标赛;冠军赛

stems_affixes.value_cn: 市民权,公民权,国民的义务[身份]
stems_affixes.word_buile: citizen公民+ship某种关系,状态→n.市民权,公民权,国民的义务[身份]
dictator专政者+ship某种关系,状态→n.独裁[权];专政
friend朋友+ship某种关系,状态→n.友谊,友好
hard艰难的+ship某种关系,状态→n.艰难,困苦
member成员+ship某种关系,状态→n.会员资格,成员资格
partner合作者+ship某种关系,状态→n.合伙企业
relation关系,联系+ship某种关系,状态→n.关系,联系

sentences.en: His dictatorship was threatened by his opponents.
sentences.cn: 他的独裁遭到反对派的威胁。

sentences.en: It has been a dictatorship for three years.
sentences.cn: 该国成为独裁国家已有三年。
